subject: Cybersecurity
title: Anonymous: The Faceless Legion
description: A quick win: understand Anonymous: The Faceless Legion.

hook.text: They have no leader, no members list, and no headquarters. But they've brought down governments.

buildup.text: Anonymous emerged from 4chan forums in 2003. Anyone could claim the name and act under the collective banner.

discovery.text: They attacked Scientology, supported Arab Spring protesters, and took down ISIS recruitment sites.

punchline.text: When everyone is Anonymous, no one can be stopped.
